vulnerabilities.msg: Cookie WEBWOLFSESSION created without the httponly flag
The web server may reveal its internal or real IP in the Location header via a request to / over HTTP/1.0. The value is "172.18.0.4".
Allowed HTTP Methods: GET, HEAD, POST, PUT, DELETE, TRACE, OPTIONS, PATCH
HTTP method ('Allow' Header): 'PUT' method could allow clients to save files on the web server.
HTTP method ('Allow' Header): 'DELETE' may allow clients to remove files on the web server.
HTTP method: 'PATCH' may allow client to issue patch commands to server. See RFC-5789.
